results.title: Hypertension in pregnancy.
results.text_hl: Where chronic @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ is treated with @CHEMICAL_Methyldopa @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008750 @@@methyldopa@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@PIH@@@ is treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, there is evidence that therapy is beneficial in terms of immediate pregnancy outcome and is not harmful to the child.

citations.NLM: Rubin PC. Hypertension in pregnancy. J Hypertens Suppl. 1987 Aug;5(3):S57-60. PMID: 2889812
citations.BibTeX: @article{2889812, title={Hypertension in pregnancy.}, author={Rubin PC}, journal={J Hypertens Suppl}, volume={5}, number={3}, pages={S57-60}}

results.title: Transplacental passage and breast milk concentrations of hydralazine.
results.text_hl: The concentration of "real" and "apparent" (= "real" @CHEMICAL_Hydralazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006830 @@@hydralazine@@@ + acid-labile hydrazones) @CHEMICAL_Hydralazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006830 @@@hydralazine@@@ in maternal and umbilical plasma obtained at delivery of 6 @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Hydralazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006830 @@@hydralazine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@pregnancy hypertension@@@ were measured by gas chromatography.

citations.NLM: Liedholm H, Wåhlin-Boll E, Hanson A, Ingemarsson I, Melander A. Transplacental passage and breast milk concentrations of hydralazine. Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 1982;21(5):417-9. PMID: 7200428
citations.BibTeX: @article{7200428, title={Transplacental passage and breast milk concentrations of hydralazine.}, author={Liedholm H and Wåhlin-Boll E and Hanson A and Ingemarsson I and Melander A}, journal={Eur J Clin Pharmacol}, volume={21}, number={5}, pages={417-9}}
